'''Beta 1.21.70.26''' (ChromeOS, Android) or '''Preview 1.21.70.26''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox, PlayStation) is the sixth and final beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.70]], released on March 5, 2025, <ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/34725094103693-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-70-26|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.70.26|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=March 5, 2025}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Title screen]]'''
* The [[panorama]] was changed to showcase the [[Spring to Life]] drop.
'''[[Spawn event]]'''
* [[Pig]]s, [[cow]]s, and [[chicken]]s can now be spawned via [[spawn event]]s, and {{cmd|summon}} or {{cmd|event}} can be used to spawn the cold and warm variants.
